title: In Debt Duel, It Was Argentina V. Paul Singer
teaser: Argentina has defaulted on billions of dollars of government debt, and it's partly due to a bunch of New Yorkers. Forbes writer Agustino Fontevecchia explains the confrontation between Argentina and a New York-based hedge fund manager named Paul Singer.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
